name: Minefield Blitz
description:
I'm a beginner. This is the first time I've made such a complicated game. The concept of this game is to combine some classic nostalgic game elements and gameplay that I know. Not very successful but at least playable, I don't have enough time to fix all the bugs, and can't make music or sound effects, maybe it will be improved when I have time.

I should have written more here, but it's 3:30AM where I live, and I haven't slept in over twenty hours, and my head is a little messed up so here it goes.
